review: Best app ever! It's simple and easy.. I'm on track. However there are sooo many advertisements!!! it's really annoying otherwise would have given 5 stars. Features I would recommend: 1.reduce the amount of ads 2.there is no selection of subject in tasks so I would recommend that (like it's in assignment). 3. Time selection. Task starts from and task finishes at That's all, I hope you add these features in future updates. Thank you. Good day

Excellent app ,thanks to developer it really helps a lot, but it lacks one feature which is nedded , in subject section when we click subjects it does not do anything instead if it shows all assignments and tasks related to subjects in one area it really helps a lot and also option to tag tasks to subjects . please if possible include it this feature

It's good and it helps me with my schedules, reminders and so on, I like the color theme/design whatsoever you called that but there is a problem, it's laggy in my phone although I don't think my phone has a problem because other apps are working properly so I don't have a choice but to uninstall. Hope you'll have time to fix it soon. Tysm for making the app despite of what I've been experienced.

After using this app for a couple of months, I found some glaring problems. For example, the notifications on the assignment due always mess up the date there are supposed to come. I make it due on Tuesday and notifications come on Wednesday. Also should be able to adjust time reminders come as well as the date.
ras4vb: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

review: Definitely amazing!! So simple, easy to use, and it covers everything you need. I only have one problem. Could you please add another time option for subjects that has more than 1 day? In the app, we can already add more days, but no added time. We can only use 1 time for each day. Sometimes the subjects has different class time for each days. Other than that, everything is perfect. I don't think the app needs improvement for the design or fonts. Would love to recommend this to my friends :>

Out of trying 30+ planners, this one has been EXACTLY what I've been looking for! My 9yo is very visual so we needed a block schedule AND a list schdule. I love how we can add single events and get rid of single blocks when needed. The only requests I would have is if there could also be a bi-weekly option, an Only Edit This option, and a select multiple events to cancel (or even a full day cancel.) Maybe even smaller words on the blocks so we could see them! But we LOVE it !‚ò∫
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. We just wanted you to know that canceling a full day is coming in the next release, we also added your other suggestions to our roadmap.

review: Absolutely love this app, i've tried so many and this is the perfect one. The only thing that would make this the absolute best is the option to have a 2 week timetable, now we can only add a class once or every week and the option to make it every 2 weeks would be amazing. Thank you so much for a great appüòÅ
The program is very good, useful and very simple. It would be good to develop a program for Windows or a website that. We really need that
This app is incredible. It is so helpful to me as student. So far i haven't faced any issue while using the app. It is very easy to use and helps me stay organized. üëç
Its a pretty decent app But it could be better if a syllabus tracker feature could be added which can track your progress and you can see if your on schedule or not
The interface is welcoming. And it has enought features for my use. Also, no problems encountered yet.
I am having some trouble with navigating it. But otherwise wonderful app. So far no distractions.
This is a really good app. Very helpful. But it lags and freezes whenever I use it and the features are very delayed. If it weren't for those, I would've given it 5 star rating.
This app deserves more recognition! No intrusive ads or whatnot and cute customizable ui, kudos to the developers! I really love this ü•∞

review: The app is awesome! Its simple and useful. But, I have a slight problem hoping you can add a deadline/due date for homeworks or for all of the options, the problem is that I don't want to be reminded on the exact same date as the deadline, but inorder to set a reminder you need to put a date, but I also want to know the actual deadline. Hope you add this üòÖ it would be great if you did. My Request: -add a separate option for the date of the deadline and the reminder date.

Downloaded this app today, it is really beautiful and I love the design on it! Has everything I need, but I still need to get used to the interactions. I do think it could improve on is being able to scroll to view all of the notes inputted into an assignment instead on having to go into edit mode to manually move the text placeholder to view everything.
ras4vb: Hello, thank you for this feedback. I had a look at the assignment screen and indeed there is no scroll when the assignment description gets long. I sent this issue to our development team and it'll be fixed very soon (probably in the next update)

review: Just started using this yesterday since I am finding an app that could really help me organize throughout this new academic year. It's so simple yet pleasing. May I also suggest to have a portion where we can add our own custom colors. Lastly the "score board" or section where we can input our scores from that task, assignment, or exam. Also thank you that it is not forcing us to get the premium subscription....but someday I might get that. Can't wait for the widget! Thank you so much!
ras4vb: Thank you for your kind words, We'll definitely consider your suggestions, please recommend the app to your friends and don't hesitate to ask any questions on info@swazerlab.com

review: I totally love this app,I recommend it.....I just want to request that maybe change the font style of galaxy cause I really love theme but the font is hard to read,I also want to request for more widgets, thank you
this app is really helpful to keep track of what I need to do with work for college.
Best studying app I have ever used it's beautiful morden and simple not too cluttered its great

the app is beautiful and very very helpful, but I have one little suggestion.. it would be cool if there was an option to repeat classes every two weeks, because I have two different schedules that alternate every week, so if the app had that option that would be great ! thanks for the app anyway !
ras4vb: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at info@swazerlab.com.

review: It's a best app ever used. It saves my time creating a timetable . It makes my schedule clear and crisp.
Amazingly organized. recommended for students

This is a great app! But there are a few changes I would like to see. Could we link teachers and classes? Could we have reoccurring tasks? Can the complete assignment option be more clear along with assignments that have been completed? These are the only things that I think could use some improvement :)

For improvement: ‚Ä¢add subtask or simple checklist under assignment and then it will work like a drop down menu or something For the user to use it without viewing the whole thing. ‚Ä¢ add time reminder (multiple time reminders would be great) in schedule, assignments, task, and exams. adding grading system will be difficult to implement but I believe you guys can do it in the future.. thank you for making this app. Have a nice day:>

I love this app, pretty easy to use, different themes everything is perfect... but the only problem I have is the assignment keeps reminding me in every 10 or 15 minutes I want to keep timing for that too so that it doesn't really disturb me I guess then it would be perfect for me and I would like to 5 stars:) Overall definitely recommend this great app

I love how greedy the dev is, there are literally same apps on playstore for less than $5 for lifetime. Some devs are so generous, they provided app for free with no ads and no data collection because it's a SCHOOL app and maybe want to save school kids some money.
ras4vb: Hello, The full functionality of the app is available for all users and we don't have any features locked for premium users only. Also the Ads in our app are carefully designed to be some of the most non-intrusive Ads you can find in any app on Play Store and our ads revenue is being completely spent on server costs. review: Great app. Gave me everything I was looking for.
